ygData.subject: Re: Motormaster's fury

Hey gas guzzler, behind you," the same voice called out to Motormaster, this 
time it was coming from the opposite direction.


>From: gestalt_menasor@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Motormaster's fury
>Date: Sun, 29 Apr 2001 03:40:25 -0000
>
>Over the hill the perched Motormaster begand to grit his mouth, he
>practically had steam blowing out of his head. "That as hell better
>not be you Wildrider" he yelled, as he turned around furiously,
>looking to the originator.
>
>
